edgeTypes.description: Connects a post to the post that it is a reply to.
Connects an author to a topic they created.
Connects an author to a post they've created.
Connects a topic to the posts that it contains.
Connects a topic to posts with likes, with weight proportional to the number of likes
Connects a Discourse like to a post that was liked.
Connects a Discourse user to a like that they created.
Connects a Discourse post to another post it referenced.
Connects a Discourse post to a topic it referenced.
Connects a Discourse post to a user it mentions

nodeTypes.description: A user account on a particular Discourse instance.
nodeTypes.name: User

nodeTypes.description: A topic (or post-container) in a Discourse instance. Every topic has at least one post.
nodeTypes.name: Topic

nodeTypes.description: A post in some topic in a Discourse instance.
nodeTypes.name: Post

nodeTypes.description: A like by some user, directed at some post
nodeTypes.name: Like

userTypes.description: A user account on a particular Discourse instance.
userTypes.name: User

edgeTypes.description:
Connects a GitHub account to a post that they authored.

Examples of posts include issues, pull requests, and comments.

Connects a GitHub entity to its child entities.

For example, a Repository has Issues and Pull Requests as children, and a
Pull Request has comments and reviews as children.
Connects a GitHub pull request to the Git commit that it merges.
Connects users to posts to which they gave a üëç reaction.
Connects users to posts to which they gave a ‚ù§Ô∏è reaction.
Connects users to posts to which they gave a üéâ reaction.
Connects users to posts to which they gave a üöÄ reaction.
Connects a commit on GitHub to the corresponding raw Git commit.

nodeTypes.description: NodeType for a GitHub pull request
nodeTypes.name: Pull request

nodeTypes.description: NodeType for a GitHub code review
nodeTypes.name: Pull request review

nodeTypes.description: Represents a particular Git commit on GitHub, i.e. scoped to a particular repository
nodeTypes.name: Commit

nodeTypes.description: NodeType for a GitHub bot account
nodeTypes.name: Bot

nodeTypes.description: A Ethereum address, that can be utilized by a participantto receive grain payouts, and linked to their identity.
nodeTypes.name: Ethereum Address Entry

userTypes.description: A Ethereum address, that can be utilized by a participantto receive grain payouts, and linked to their identity.
